cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(ImGUI)

add_library(imgui 
    imgui.h 
    imgui.cpp 
    imconfig.h
    imgui_draw.cpp
    imgui_internal.h
    imgui_tables.cpp
    imgui_widgets.cpp
    imstb_rectpack.h
    imstb_textedit.h
    imstb_truetype.h
    imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
    imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp
    imgui_impl_glfw.h
    imgui_impl_opengl3.h
    imgui_impl_opengl3_loader.h
)

target_link_libraries(imgui glfw)
target_include_directories(imgui PUBLIC include/)
